Episodes.Title: Episode 1
Episodes.Plot: Four life-long friends visit Majorca to meet up with the fifth member of their gang to celebrate his early retirement, only to become entangled in a web of deception and murder.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,sex scenes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 2
Episodes.Plot: Tensions simmer as Woody, Quinn, Baxter and Rick stumble into a scenario that is spiralling out of control.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,sex scenes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 3
Episodes.Plot: The friends realise the gravity of their situation and come up with a plan to make Alvo's murder look like a Russian Mafia hit, fearful that gangsters will soon come looking for their money. The pals have already cut off one of the victim's feet - but paranoia reopens old wounds.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,sex scenes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 4
Episodes.Plot: The critically applauded drama concludes, finishing on the headiest of highs. Barricaded in the villa, things really do go from bad to worse for Woody, Quinn, Baxter and Rick.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,sex scenes and content that may disturb
